akn:content.akn:p: (b) Policy It is the policy of Congress that it is in the public interest to authorize the establishment, through the exercise of the powers provided in this chapter, of an orderly procedure for developing, financing (through adequate assessments on sheep and sheep products produced or imported into the United States), and carrying out an effective, continuous, coordinated program of promotion, research, consumer information, education, and industry information designed to—
(c) Construction Nothing in this chapter provides for the control of production, or otherwise limits, the right of any person to produce sheep or sheep products.
